text: The Perfect Couple may refer to: * A Perfect Couple, a 1979 film directed by Robert Altman * The Perfect Couple (1954 film), a West German comedy film * The Perfect Couple (2007 film), a South Korean film * "The Perfect Couple" (The Inside), an episode of The Inside * "The Perfect Couple" (The O.C.), an episode of The O.C. * "The Perfect Couple", a song by Paul Heaton from Fat Chance * "Cặp đôi hoàn hảo", the Vietnamese version of TV series Just the Two of Us * Perfect Couples, a 2010-2011 American sitcom
title: Perfect Couple
